categories: Category:Members of the 181st Imperial Fighter Wing

nodes.text: Hedrian was a human male pilot of the Galactic Empire. He served alongside his other brothers, in the 181st Imperial Fighter Wing during the Galactic Civil War. His sister Havina Vonreg served in Titan Squadron. At one point prior to the mission to Hosnian Prime, Hedrian and his brothers were killed in a raid on the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Imperial Era.
